# sendgrid Provider

A Terraform provider to interact with SendGrid API...

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configuration-based authentication
provider "sendgrid" {
  apikey = "SG.*************************************"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `apikey` (String, Sensitive) Api key to authenticate SendGrid
